title: Krak Minute – Passeig de la Peira, Barcelona
content:
Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

Marshall Heath – Nose manny nollie flip manny – Sk8mafia ‘Brain Gone’
Phil Zwijsen & Nick Garcia – Nosetap nose manny – Element in Barcelona Fall 2019
Nick Garcia – Boardslide nose manny reverse – Element in Barcelona Fall 2019
Tanner Burzinski – Pop shuvit nosetap nose manny & switch nosetap shuvit fakie manny – 30 Days in Heaven
Stephen Lawyer – Treflip nose manny – Sk8mafia ‘Brain Gone’
Lucas Puig – Fakie inward fakie manny – Adidas ‘Away Days’
Lem Villemin – Fakie hardflip fakie manny – Adidas ‘Away Days’
Rodrigo TX – Nollie fs flip switch manny – Adidas ‘Away Days’
Flo Mirtain – Fs flip fakie manny – Habitat intro clip
Enrique Lorenzo – Switch bs 180 nose manny – Digital ‘Divercity’
Tyler Surrey – Switch bs flip nose manny – Sk8mafia ‘Brain Gone’
author: simon
